about_the_game:
"3.2m2" is an immersive room escape game that challenges players to solve puzzles and uncover secrets within confined, atmospheric spaces. In each room, you’ll face unique puzzles and changing environments, creating a sense of suspense and urgency as you attempt to break free. Will you be able to escape the routine and find your way out?

Key Features:

  • Engaging Room Escape Mechanics: Each room presents its own set of challenges and mysteries. Search for clues, collect items, and solve intricate puzzles to unlock the path forward.

  • Atmospheric Environments: The game’s mood evolves with each action, drawing you deeper into the mystery. Dark and tense surroundings add to the immersive experience, enhancing the thrill of escape.

  • Intuitive Controls: Navigate the room using W, A, S, and D keys, and interact with objects by pressing G. Adjust your perspective to thoroughly inspect the environment and uncover hidden clues.

  • Puzzle Variety and Challenge: From logic-based puzzles to observational challenges, each escape room offers something new. The difficulty level increases as you progress, keeping you engaged and testing your problem-solving skills.

  • Replayability: Revisit rooms to discover hidden elements or try new approaches. Each playthrough can reveal something previously missed, adding depth to the game experience.

Prepare to test your wits and observational skills in "3.2m2". With every interaction, you’ll inch closer to freedom—but can you escape the routine before time runs out?
